name: Your Company Name Conference Newsletter Email Template
description: A professional 680px-wide email newsletter template for the Your Company Name healthcare conference. Features a hero banner with gradient overlay, call-for-abstracts section with dark red background and watermark, delegate registration and exhibition booking sections with split layouts, video highlights with play button overlay, conference secretariat contact details, and a dark footer. Uses Arial for email-safe typography with red/charcoal/grey color scheme. Ideal for healthcare conferences, medical events, and professional association communications.
